title: Perfected corrupted equipment

properties.name: description
properties.value:
[[File:|thumb|130px|A player wearing the perfected corrupted armour.]]
Perfected corrupted equipment is a set of armour and weapons created within The Corrupted Gauntlet. It is the highest tier of the corrupted sets, one tier higher than attuned corrupted equipment. Its cristalline counterpart is the perfected crystal equipment.

content:
[[File:|thumb|130px|A player wearing the perfected corrupted armour.]] Perfected corrupted equipment is a set of armour and weapons created within The Corrupted Gauntlet. It is the highest tier of the corrupted sets, one tier higher than attuned corrupted equipment. Its cristalline counterpart is the perfected crystal equipment.

rawContent:
[[File:|thumb|130px|A player wearing the perfected corrupted armour.]]
'''Perfected corrupted equipment''' is a set of armour and weapons created within [[The Corrupted Gauntlet]]. It is the highest tier of the corrupted sets, one tier higher than [[attuned corrupted equipment]]. Its cristalline counterpart is the [[perfected crystal equipment]].

==Armour bonuses==
{{Infotable Bonuses|Corrupted helm (perfected)|Corrupted body (perfected)|Corrupted legs (perfected)|nototals=yes}}

==Weapon bonuses==
{{Infotable Bonuses|Corrupted bow (perfected)|Corrupted halberd (perfected)|Corrupted staff (perfected)|nototals=yes}}

==Gallery==
<gallery>
Perfected corrupted armour (female) equipped.png
Perfected corrupted armour (male) equipped.png
</gallery>

==See also==
* [[(perfected)]], the suffix this equipment has

{{The Gauntlet}}
[[Category:Equipment]]
